comment: The degree of a vertex in an empty graph is zero, because there are no edges. This is the base case for the induction for calculating the degree of a vertex, for example in a Königsberg graph (see also the induction steps ~ vdegp1ai , ~ vdegp1bi and ~ vdegp1ci ).
